text: magar phir jab hamaaree baaragaah se (deen) haq unake paas pahuncha to kahane lage jaise (maujize) moosa ko ata hue the vaise hee is rasool (mohammad) ko kyon nahee die gae kya jo maujize isase pahale moosa ko ata hue the unase in logon ne inkaar na kiya tha kuphfaar to ye bhee kah guzare ki ye donon ke donon (taurait va kuraan) jaadoo hain ki baaham ek doosare ke madadagaar ho gae hain
